title: Awa ni mo Narenai Koi Nara ba
description:
A collection of stories, 2-5 are loosely linked.

1) It Won't Turn to Foam if it's Love: Thanks to his colleague Ishihara, Kobayashi has landed his dream job. But when it doesn't lead to the success he hoped for, Kobayashi feels guilty that Ishihara didn't take the job himself, and decides he'll make amends.

2) God is at Town Hall: When a bizarre love triangle develops among the members of a surveying crew deep in the mountains, a local god intervenes.

3-4) God is at Town Hall Again (Two Parts): A student in the civil engineering department of the local vocational school falls for his teacher. But what are sensei's feelings? God wants to know too.

5) My God is at Town Hall: Harboring feelings for local celebrity/god Akaishi since their youth, Arashima wonders if his love will suddenly come to light.

6) Sorry I'm a Good Boy!: Tutored in math by his uncle when he was younger, Sera learned a few other lessons too. But he's a high school punk now, and when his inscrutable uncle shows up out of the blue to continue with the after school assistance, Sera's having none of it.

matches.title: Rakuda Tsukai to Ouji no Yoru
Uchi no Ani no Renai Jijou
Eyes of the Cormorant, Eyes of the Hawk
